title: 136A.832 PENALTY.
text: The commissioner may assess fines for violations of sections 136A.821 to 136A.834. Each day's failure to comply with sections 136A.821 to 136A.834 shall be a separate violation and fines shall not exceed $500 per day per violation. Amounts received under this section must be deposited in the special revenue fund and are appropriated to the office for the purposes of sections 136A.821 to 136A.834.
